product_name: Zipp Tangente Platinum Pro Evo Brake Pads
long_description: Offering solid braking power, carbon rim compatibility and all-weather performance, the Zipp Tangente Platinum Pro Evo brake pads work with current SRAM and Shimano caliper brakes. Pads supply smooth speed management for the many small braking efforts that happen in races or group rides, yet also supply responsive power when you need to drop speed fast. Carbon-friendly compound provides long-wearing performance in wet or dry conditions. Zipp Tangente Platinum Pro pads are designed for use on carbon rims and have not been approved for use on aluminum braking surfaces.
short_description: Offering solid braking power, carbon rim compatibility and all-weather performance, the Zipp Tangente Platinum Pro Evo brake pads work with current SRAM and Shimano caliper brakes.
